data.title: Mighty Mouse, the New Adventures! — Cooperative Computer Services
data.meta_description: Mighty Mouse, the New Adventures! — Follow the humorous, satirical adventures of Mike Mouse, a worker at Pearl Pureheart's factory. He has an all new set of friends including: orphan sidekick Scrappy Mouse; the superhero Bat-Bat (a.k.a. Bruce Vein); and Tick the Bug Wonder. Together they do battle with the evil antagonists "The Cow, " "The Glove" and the prematurely bald Petery Pate.
data.text: Follow the humorous, satirical adventures of Mike Mouse, a worker at Pearl Pureheart's factory. He has an all new set of friends including: orphan sidekick Scrappy Mouse; the superhero Bat-Bat (a.k.a. Bruce Vein); and Tick the Bug Wonder. Together they do battle with the evil antagonists "The Cow, " "The Glove" and the prematurely bald Petery Pate.
